mapper.select:
select * from xhgmnet_asset_check where 1=1
order by applyTime desc limit #{start},#{limit}
mapper.update: update xhgmnet_operations_work set status=1 where id=#{id}

update xhgmnet_operations_quality set fileName = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, filePath = #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uploadUser = #{uploaduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recvUser = #{recvuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
